name: Rewinder (Nolan)
description:
Rewinder is a game made in one week for a gamejam hosted by brackeys.

You play as the progress bar of a video, or more specifically the very end of it. You have to destroy randomly spawning enemies with your ability to rewind. The enemies shoot projectiles in your direction which you have to reverse in order survive.

Rewinder is an endless mini game. Because it was made in under one week there isn't much content and unfortunately i was unable to create some music.
